text: @realDonaldTrump Again you’re White HOUSE SPEACH was nothing about IMPORTANT ISSUES all it was is a time of shit that had nothing to do with the CORONAVIRUS or Anything of IMPORTANT THINGS ABOUT THE AMERICAN PEOPLE,IT TURNED OUT TO BE ABOUT YOU,
